name: Melancholic
description: This character has a hard time seeing the good in life.

name: Lunatic
description: Plagued by hallucinations, delusions and disorganized thoughts, this character struggles to distinguish between what is real and what is not.

name: Possessed
description: The sudden changes in emotion, awareness and ability that this character experiences can only be explained by spirits inhabiting their body.

name: Fecund
description: This character is fruitful and fertile.

name: Albino
description: With their white hair and red eyes, this character strikes fear in many.

name: Lisping
description: This character has trouble pronouncing certain sounds.

name: Stuttering
description: Finishing a sentence quickly is not this character's strong suit.

name: Pure-blooded
description: This character is of a pure bloodline.

name: Giant
description: Others have to crane their necks, and rein in awe, as this character walks by.

name: Scaly
description: This character is covered in scaly patches of skin.

name: Club-footed
description: This character is cursed with twisted feet and an unsightly walk.

name: Dwarf
description: This character is afflicted by a genetic disorder that stunts their growth.

name: Hunchbacked
description: This character is weighted down by the curse of a humpback.

name: Sterile / Barren
description: This character cannot produce children.

name: Wheezing
description: This character is cursed to spend their life coughing and wheezing.

name: Spindly
description: This character's limbs are long and knobby.

name: Bleeder
description: Any kind of wound might prove fatal to this character since their sanguine humors are in a hurry to escape their body.

name: Shrewd
description: Life has taught this character the value of good judgement and sharp wit.

name: Strong
description: Though training and perseverance, this character has been granted a strong body.

name: Scarred
description: Visibly wearing the memories of battles or accidents, this character is noticeably scarred.

name: One-Eyed

effects.effected_attr: Likelihood of capture or death in battle

description: This character only has one eye.

name: One-Legged

effects.effected_attr: Likelihood of capture or death in battle

description: This character only has one leg.

name: Disfigured

effects.effected_attr: Likelihood of capture or death in battle

description: This character is hideously disfigured.

name: Weak
description: This character's body is on the decline.

name: Dull
description: It has been a long time since this character's mind had any exercise.

name: Eunuch
description: This character has been intentionally castrated.

name: August
description: The August is honored as a true ruler, worthy of the empires of old!

name: Diplomat
description: The Diplomat navigates the perilous waters of social interactions deftly, and achieves their goals with dazzling charisma and conviction while mediating between the highest rulers of the land.

name: Patriarch / Matriarch
description: A person who is truly dedicated to their family, and the prosperity of their House.

name: Gallant
description: True nobility comes not only from one's blood, but from actions tempered by a spirit like gleaming steel.

name: Overseer
description: The guidance, firmness of hand, and authority ensure problems are solved properly.

name: Strategist

effects.effected_attr: Crosses rivers & straits without advantage loss

description: The Strategist is a dedicated student of of the art of war, capable of turning any situation to their advantage.

name: Administrator
description: To organize, administrate, and raise efficiency - the Administrator will get it done.

name: Architect
description: The works of an experienced builder will stand for centuries.

name: Avaricious
description: Gold, gold, gold! Can there be any higher calling, and goal more noble, than the pursuit of wealth?

name: Schemer
description: The Schemer lives to understand and manipulate the things that drive other people - and exploit them!

name: Seducer / Seductress
description: It is not difficult to desire. The true challenge is to be desired.

name: Torturer
description: Inflicting pain. Holding someone's life in your hands. This is true power.

name: Scholar
description: Philosophy, nature, and knowledge. Understanding the world is the only way to rule it.

name: Theologian
description: Divinity holds the answer to every question, from what resides in the hearts of men, to the mysteries of life.

name: Whole of Body
description: Know yourself, know your limitations, and know the full extent of your reach.

name: Celibate
description: This character has sworn themselves to celibacy.

name: Herbalist
description: This character is well versed in herbs, botany, and medical practices related to plants.

name: Gardener
description: This character knows everything there is to know about gardens, plants, and how to tend them.

name: Aggressive Attacker
description: Nothing will sate the Aggressive Attacker but the blood of their enemies.

name: Flexible leader
description: The Flexible leader knows how to reduce the Advantage defending armies get from fortifications, terrain, rivers and strait crossings.

name: Forder

effects.effected_attr: Crosses rivers & straits without advantage penalties

description: The Forder is at home close to water and will suffer no Advantage penalty in battles when disembarking from ships or attacking across straits or rivers.

name: Holy Warrior
description: Burning with religious fervor, the Holy Warrior will not rest until all Heathens are defeated.

name: Logistician
description: If there is one thing the Logistician knows, it is how to make supplies last - and last well.

name: Military Engineer
description: With extensive knowledge of siege engines and defensive capabilities, the  Military Engineer will not be kept at bay.

name: Organizer
description: In capable hands, a well organized army can swiftly outmaneuver the enemy in any situation.

name: Reaver
description: The Reaver longs for loot almost as much as victory: if there is anything of value to be had they will find it.

name: Unyielding Defender
description: The Unyielding Defender knows one thing above all else; this is as far as the enemy goes.

name: Cautious Leader
description: The Cautious Leader is careful not to take any unnecessary risk in battles, but does so at the cost of potential gain.

name: Reckless
description: If there is an advantage to be had, the Reckless is sure to seize it.

name: Forest Fighter

effects.effected_attr: Advantage in forest and taiga terrain

description: Where some see forests as obstacles, the Forest Fighter sees opportunity.

name: Open Terrain Expert

effects.effected_attr: Advantage in farmlands, plains and steppe terrain

description: Open fields and vast spaces are where the Open Terrain Expert feels at home, and they are swift to take advantage of this in battle.

name: Rough Terrain Expert

effects.effected_attr: Advantage in hills, mountains and wetlands terrain

description: Difficult terrain can be a powerful tool for those able to utilize it to gain the upper hand in battle.

name: Desert Warrior

effects.effected_attr: Advantage in desert, desert mountains, drylands and oasis terrain

description: The punishing sun and beating heat of the desert is no foe to the Desert Warrior.

name: Jungle Stalker
description: The lush forest of any jungle is an ally to the Jungle Stalker.

name: Winter Soldier

effects.effected_attr: Movement speed in baronies affected by winter
Advantage in in baronies affected by winter

description: The Winter Soldier is molded by the bitter cold, and knows how to turn it to their advantage.

name: Adulterer
description: This character has violated the sanctity of marriage by copulating with another.

name: Fornicator
description: This character has copulated outside of wedlock.

name: Deviant
description: This character has an... eclectic and unconventional taste.

name: Dynastic Kinslayer
description: This character has committed the sin of murdering a dynasty member.

name: Familial Kinslayer
description: This character has slain a member of their extended family.

name: Kinslayer
description: This character is known for having slain close kin.

name: Incestuous
description: This character is known for having sexual relations with relatives.

name: Sodomite
description: This character is known for having sexual relations with people of their own gender.

name: Witch
description: This character dabbles in subjects many would consider occult.

name: Cannibal
description: This character thinks that other people make the best of meals.

name: Excommunicated
description: This character has been excluded from participating in religious services.

name: Murderer
description: This character has illegally brought about someone's demise.

name: Drunkard
description: This character has taken to the bottle, and is constantly looking for its bottom.

name: Flagellant
description: The catharsis of self-flagellation is the only thing which makes this character feel better.

name: Comfort Eater
description: This character often tries to fill the emptiness they feel by indulging in comforting foods.

name: Contrite
description: This character suffers from a guilty conscience, often feeling compelled to confess things better left unmentioned.

name: Improvident
description: This character habitually gives far more money away to charities than they can reasonably afford.

name: Inappetetic
description: Stress has ruined this character's appetite, causing them to skip meals and waste away...

name: Reclusive
description: This character often sequestrates themselves away and neglects their responsibilities.

name: Irritable

effects.effected_attr: Enables the release you anger interaction

description: Stress has made this character prone to frequent outbursts and tantrums.

name: Rakish
description: This character spends so much time in the brothel that it has become their second home.

name: Hashishiyah
description: This character is dependent on the consumption of hashish to deal with the stress of everyday life.

name: Profligate
description: Compulsive spending causes this character to frequently waste money on unnecessary purchases.

name: Confider
description: In sharing their problems with a close confidant, this character has become able to manage life far better than they could before.

name: Journaller
description: This character has taken to writing down the thoughts which plague them to make them easier to manage.

name: Athletic
description: Regular exercise helps this character keep a level head and burn off stress.

name: Bastard
description: This character was not born of a legal pairing of parents, or a concubine, and will have to live with the stain of illegitimacy their whole life.

name: Bastard Founder
description: A former bastard who has founded their own Dynasty.

name: Born in the Purple
description: This character was born to prominent parents, a rich life and high expectations.

name: Child of Concubine
description: This character was born of a concubine.This character was fathered by a concubine.

name: Denounced

effects.effected_attr: Crime towards members of the same dynasty

description: This character has been denounced by the Dynasty Head and can now be imprisoned by any other Dynasty member.

name: Disinherited

effects.effected_attr: Can not inherit titles from the same dynasty

description: This character has been disinherited by the Dynasty Head and cannot inherit any title from any Dynasty member.

name: Disputed Heritage
description: Credible Rumors surround this character's heritage. Many say that their father is someone else.

name: Legitimized Bastard
description: This character was born a bastard, but has since been legitimized.

name: Reincarnation
description: This character is said to be the reincarnation of their ancestor.

name: Twin
description: This character was born a twin.

name: Wild Oat
description: This character was born out of wedlock.

name: Augustus
description: This character is the current ruler of the restored Roman Empire and commands the respect an office of such magnitude is due.

name: Chakravarti
description: This character has united the center of the world, and is the rightful ruler of its entirety.

name: Greatest of Khans
description: This character has been proclaimed the ruler of the universe itself, by right of conquest.

name: Pilgrim
description: This character has completed a pilgrimage to a holy site.

name: Hajji / Hajjah
description: This character has completed the Hajj, a pilgrimage to the House of Allah in Mecca.

name: Adventurer
description: This character has led a life of bravery and action as an adventurer.

name: Berserker
description: Once this character's blood starts to boil it will only be sated by the death of their enemies.

name: Devoted
description: This character has dedicated their life to the service of a higher power.

name: Heresiarch
description: This character is the local leader of a heretical sect.

name: Holy Monarch
description: A great warrior King who has carved their own kingdom out of the lands of the infidels.

name: Order Member
description: This character serves in a militarized Holy Order.

name: Peasant Leader
description: This character is a jumped up peasant who revolted against their betters.

name: Pregnant
description: This character is with child.

name: Poet

effects.effected_attr: Enables the send poem character interaction

description: This character enjoys spending their evenings giving rhyme and verse to their thoughts, feelings and experiences.

name: Raider
description: This character is a well-known plunderer of foreign settlements.

name: Shieldmaiden
description: This character defies the normal structures of their society, fighting in the shield wall.

name: Crusader
description: This character has participated in a Crusade.

name: Mujahid
description: This character has participated in a Jihad.

name: Warrior of the Faith
description: This character has participated in a Great Holy War.

name: Loyal

effects.effected_attr: Less likely to join factions against their liege

description: This person takes their relations more seriously than most.

name: Disloyal

effects.effected_attr: More likely to join factions against their liege

description: Where most people see a relationship this person sees an opportunity.

name: Saint
description: Exceptionally holy, the saint is a beacon of light for everyone religious.

name: Wounded
description: Has been wounded but, will probably heal fine given time.

name: Severely Injured
description: Has been severely injured, and the road to recovery could be a long one.

name: Brutally Mauled
description: Has been broken, and is clinging to life.

name: Sickly
description: Suffering from a sickly disposition.

name: Impotent
description: Struggles to perform in the bedroom.

name: Infirm
description: Weak of body, character is not fit for much except waiting for death to claim them.

name: Incapable
description: Due to physical injury or mental disability, this character is unable to take care of themselves, or take decisions independently.

name: Inbred
description: This character's family has been a bit too familiar.

name: Maimed
description: This character has been seriously maimed.

name: Blind
description: Through an accident or since birth, this character can see nothing.

name: Brave

effects.effected_attr: Likelihood of capture or death in battle

description: Challenges or danger, this character fears nothing.

name: Craven

effects.effected_attr: Likelihood of capture or death in battle

description: This character does not enjoy being challenged, or scared, at all.

name: Calm
description: This character takes things in stride, leading a slow-paced life.

name: Wrathful
description: This character is quick to anger and fury.

name: Chaste
description: This character dislikes intimate contact, avoiding the temptations of the flesh.

name: Lustful
description: Carnal desires burn hot in this character's core.

name: Content

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through execution of noncriminal prisoners, claim throne, or force onto council

description: What they already have, be it much or little, is enough for this character.

name: Ambitious

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through gifting titles (if under domain limit), granting vassals independence, or signing white peace in offensive wars

description: This character knows what they want, and they are not afraid to try and get it.

name: Diligent
description: This character does not shy away from hard work.

name: Lazy
description: The easiest road in life is the road most taken by this character.

name: Fickle
description: This character changes their mind more often than not, making them hard to predict.

name: Stubborn
description: This character does not back down for anything.

name: Forgiving

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through blackmail, murder, torture, imprisonment and title revocation

description: This character is quick to move on from most things.

name: Vengeful

effects.effected_attr: Hostile scheme success chance against rivals
Enables the fabricate hook scheme against rivals
Stress loss through execution and murder of rivals

description: This character is slow to forget a slight or someone who does them wrong.

name: Generous
description: Acts of benevolence and charity are no strangers to this character.

name: Greedy

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through granting title, if under domain limit

description: This character keeps a tight grip on their purse and is always looking for ways to engorge it.

name: Gregarious

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain from failure during sway schemes

description: This character enjoys spending time with other people.

name: Shy

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through inviting characters to court and plots

description: This character prefers to avoid interacting with other people.

name: Honest
description: This character values truth and sincerity highly.

name: Deceitful

effects.effected_attr: Enables the study the art of scheming decision

description: To lie and deceive is in this character's nature.

name: Humble
description: This character does not ask for much in life.

name: Arrogant

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through granting vassals independence, legitimizing bastard or signing white peace in offensive wars

description: This character has no problem with their sense of worth.

name: Just

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through blackmail and execution of prisoners

description: This character has a strong sense of justice.

name: Arbitrary
description: This character does their own thing and has little regard for others.

name: Patient
description: To wait and bide their time is a specialty of this character.

name: Impatient
description: This character thinks that most things should happen fast: ideally they should happen now!.

name: Temperate
description: According to this character, it's best to enjoy things in moderation.

name: Gluttonous

effects.effected_attr: Less likely to die from poisoning during murder schemes

description: This character scoffs at moderation; they want it all!.

name: Trusting

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through blackmail and execution of noncriminal prisoners

description: This character is quick to place their faith in others.

name: Paranoid

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through inviting characters to court and plots

description: This character sees enemies in every shadow.

name: Zealous
description: Religious conviction burns bright at the center of this character.

name: Cynical
description: This character trusts the self-interest of others above all else.

name: Compassionate

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain through kick from court, disinherit, denounce, break up with lover, dismiss concubine, fabricate hook, blackmail, imprison, move to dungeon, execution, start murder, start abduct, torture and title revocation

description: Both merciful and sympathetic, this character is warmhearted.

name: Callous

effects.effected_attr: Stress gain from releasing prisoners (w/out demands)

description: Being called both heartless and cold-blooded, this character is indifferent to most.

name: Sadistic

effects.effected_attr: Can use hostile schemes against own children
Stress loss through execution and murder

description: Few things bring this character as much joy as the suffering of others.

effects.effected_attr: Enables the hold mystical communion decision
Enables the hold mystical communion decision
Enables the hold mystical communion decision

name: Naive Appeaser
description: The Naive Appeaser has been somewhat educated in the art of diplomacy but is nevertheless more often an embarrassment to themselves and those around them than not.

name: Adequate Bargainer
description: Things often work out in favor of the Adequate Bargainer, but whether this is due to their skill in diplomacy or luck is up for debate.

name: Charismatic Negotiator
description: A master of persuasive rhetoric and the nuances of diplomacy; the Charismatic Negotiator is an excellent diplomat.

name: Grey Eminence
description: As familiar with the nuances of diplomacy as the back of their hand, the Grey Eminence is a master of the art.

name: Misguided Warrior
description: The Misguided Warrior has received an education in the art of war, but is more likely to hurt themselves than their enemies.

name: Tough Soldier
description: The Tough Soldier has shown some prowess in martial matters, but still has a lot to learn.

name: Skilled Tactician
description: The Skilled Tactician is a reliable commander and fearsome warrior, renowned for their martial skill.

name: Brilliant Strategist
description: The battlefield is the domain of the Brilliant Strategist, and no martial matter is beyond their knowledge.

name: Indulgent Wastrel
description: The Indulgent Wastrel received an education in stewardship to study the flow of money, but unfortunately the flow seems to go only one way...

name: Thrifty Clerk
description: The Thrifty Clerk is adequate when it comes to investments and administrations, but blunders in the art of stewardship are still the norm.

name: Fortune Builder
description: The Fortune Builder possesses a keen sense for all matters relating to stewardship and is an administrative force to be reckoned with.

name: Midas Touched
description: The Midas Touched is followed by success after success in the art of stewardship, displaying an indisputable mastery of the art.

name: Amateurish Plotter
description: The Amateurish Plotter has had some education in the art of intrigue, but any knowledge in the art has eluded them.

name: Flamboyant Trickster
description: The Flamboyant Trickster has received an education in the art of intrigue, but still has a lot left to learn before mistakes and blunders become exceptions rather than the norm.

name: Intricate Webweaver
description: The Intricate Webweaver is a master of intrigue, manipulation, and secrecy.

name: Elusive Shadow
description: The Elusive Shadow has excelled as a master of intrigue, and the shroud of secrecy around them is second to none.

name: Conscientious Scribe
description: Despite an education focused on learning the Conscientious Scribe shows little aptitude for the subject — at least they can read...

name: Insightful Thinker
description: The Insightful Thinker is adept at most matters theological, but sadly both actual skill and dedication seem to be lacking.

name: Astute Intellectual
description: The Astute Intellectual possesses a deep understanding of theology, philosophy, and all subjects of deeper learning.

name: Mastermind Philosopher
description: The Mastermind Philosopher possess an uncanny insight into all subjects of higher learning.

name: Bumbling Squire
description: The Bumbling Squire is only technically a knight, remembering little from their formal training.

name: Confident Knight
description: The Confident Knight is familiar with the ways of their culture's traditional combat, even fighting a few actions against recalcitrant peasants as a teenager.

name: Formidable Banneret
description: The Formidable Banneret led troops and fought bandits even before their majority, battle-hardened into a determined combatant.

name: Famous Champion
description: The Famous Champion is known, respected, and perhaps even feared throughout the realm as a paragon of their culture's warrior practices.

name: Town Dweller
description: The Town Dweller has been initiated to the management of cities.

name: Mayor Trainee
description: The Mayor Trainee has been trained in the art of city management.

name: Town Maven
description: The Town Maven has developed a strong sense of city management.

name: Republican Heir
description: The Republican Heir has mastered the arcane art of city management.
